item.title: How to host your static website using Apache2 on a Linux
item.description: How to host your static website using Apache2 on a Linux machine deployed on Azure. In this quick tutorial, We are going to learn Azure Linux VM Configuration, Few Linux VM Commands, and Apache Web Server Install and display our own Webpage on a Public IP address from anywhere. Deployment Components : Linux VM : Ubuntu Server 20.04 LTS Compute Resources on : **Azure ** Web Server : **Apache2 ** Web Front End : HTML Deployment Steps 1st Step: Deploy Azure Compute Resource : Linux VM (Ubuntu 20.
